name: Comin' in Hot
description:
Comin' in Hot is a single button platformer created in ~8 hours for Mini Jam 76 (Radiation). Using just the space bar, you control the unlikely hero Blockhead who must utilize the power of radiation to get bigger, faster, but takes away your life so... umm not stronger? Get him to each level's exit before time runs out but don't run out of life due to all the radiation!

Controls (haha!)
Space bar (and Tab to toggle audio volume)

While grounded - Jump
While jumping - Double jump and shake off radiation (undoing its  positive effects)
While against wall - Jump again in opposite direction (does not shake off radiation)

Installation
You can play in browser (above) or download below and unzip like any Unity game. If you're playing this, you know the drill.

Assets
Shout out to the amazing chip tune music by sawsquarenoise
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos

Font: https://www.dafont.com/pixeled.font

Engine: Unity

Final Thoughts
I wish I had started Saturday so that I had more time to make levels/sprites because I really enjoyed playing this one and I think with a few more levels it could have really been something. Anyways, hope you all enjoy.
